about_the_game:
Behold, thirsty adventurers! Immerse yourself in a do-or-die mission where the fate of a princess and her girlfriend is at stake.

As Elara, the busty dark elf princess of Eldoria, you must storm the castle of Lilith, the succubus queen, who holds her beloved Seraphina captive.

Can you overcome strategic battles against the queen's horde of seductive Rubenesque succubi?




• Experience an intense boss-rush dungeon crawler RPG where every encounter is a battle of wits, strategy, and persistence.
• Experience a thrilling adventure that respects your time and presents a challenge solely in the final dungeon.
• Experience the thrill of classic gaming with Game Boy Color-style sounds and visuals that bring nostalgia in a new and whimsical way.
• Prepare to face 40+ lady demons with unique powers and strategies, who will push your patience to the limit and destroy you unless you out-fight them.
• In intense party-based battles, strategy is crucial, and building an arsenal is essential for dealing with intense threats in innovative ways.
• Explore the grand, sprawling, and perilous Castle of the Succubus Queen, exploring its labyrinthine corridors and uncovering numerous secrets.
• Customize your party by uncovering equipment and stat-boosting items in the Succubus Queen's castle compounds, making wise choices to enhance their abilities or boost their potential.
• Enhance your party's build with "Soul Fragments," inspired by the Paper Mario duology's badges.
• Experience a thrilling mission centered on strategic boss fights, eliminating tedious level grinding and mindless random battles.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains depictions of extreme bodily proportions, in pixel art form. Enemy succubi will have articles of their clothing damaged during battles.

-All characters in The Succubus Queen and the Holy Sword are 18+ and over
-References to and depictions of death and violence
-Risque outfits, topless female nudity and complete female nudity
-Breasts bigger than torsos or bodies
-Butts bigger than heads or torsos
-Hips wider than shoulders
-Weight gain and fat or obese bodies
-References to lesbian sex acts in dialogue

name: The Succubus Queen and the Holy Sword

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and Newer
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and Newer
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Sound Card: Yes
